messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Ritalin -- correction
messages.msgSnippet: Apparently the study found that after only 3 months, every one of a dozen children (so 8.5%) treated with Ritalin had a three-fold increase in chromosome
messages.messageBody:
Apparently the study found that after only 3 months, every one of a dozen children (so 8.5%) treated with Ritalin had a three-fold increase in chromosome abnormalities associated with increased risks of cancer.

****

I misread that to mean 'one out of every dozen' which would mean 8%. Upon re-reading it, they actually said 'every one of the dozen children' in the study -- 100%! had a three-fold increase in abnormalities! Yikes!

Sylvia
